tripleplay.util
Class TextConfig

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.util.TextConfig

public class TextConfig
extends Object

Encapsulates a styled text configuration and provides utility methods for rendering it in various ways.

Field Summary
 EffectRenderer effect
           
 TextFormat format
           
 int textColor
           
 
Constructor Summary
TextConfig(int textColor)
           
TextConfig(TextFormat format, int textColor)
           
TextConfig(TextFormat format, int textColor, EffectRenderer effect)
           
 
Method Summary
 CanvasImage createImage(TextLayout layout)
          Creates a canvas image just big enough to hold the supplied text layout.
 TextLayout layout(String text)
          Lays out the supplied text using this config's format.
 void render(Canvas canvas, TextLayout layout, float x, float y)
          Renders the supplied layout into the supplied canvas at the specified coordinates, using this config's text color and effect.
 CanvasImage toImage(String text)
          Lays out the supplied text, creates an image large enough to accommodate the text, renders the text into it, and returns the image.
 CanvasImage toImage(TextLayout layout)
          Creates an image large enough to accommodate the supplied text layout, renders the text into it, and returns the image.
 ImageLayer toLayer(String text)
          Creates an image with the supplied text laid out and rendered into it per this config, and returns an image layer containing the image.
 ImageLayer toLayer(TextLayout layout)
          Creates an image with the supplied text layout rendered into it per this config, and returns an image layer containing the image.
 TextConfig withColor(int textColor)
          Returns a new text config which uses the specified text color.
 TextConfig withFont(Font font)
          Returns a new text config with a text format updated to use the specified font.
 TextConfig withFormat(TextFormat format)
          Returns a new text config which uses the specified text format.
 TextConfig withOutline(int outlineColor)
          Returns a new text config which uses a pixel outline effect.
 TextConfig withOutline(int outlineColor, float outlineWidth)
          Returns a new text config which uses a vector outline effect.
 TextConfig withShadow(int shadowColor, float shadowX, float shadowY)
          Returns a new text config which uses a shadow effect.

withOutline

                              float outlineWidth)

layout

public TextLayout layout(String text)
Lays out the supplied text using this config's format.

createImage

public CanvasImage createImage(TextLayout layout)
Creates a canvas image just big enough to hold the supplied text layout. Note that this method does not render the layout into the image, use toImage(java.lang.String) for that.

render

public void render(Canvas canvas,
                   TextLayout layout,
                   float x,
                   float y)
Renders the supplied layout into the supplied canvas at the specified coordinates, using this config's text color and effect.

toImage

public CanvasImage toImage(String text)
Lays out the supplied text, creates an image large enough to accommodate the text, renders the text into it, and returns the image.

toImage

public CanvasImage toImage(TextLayout layout)
Creates an image large enough to accommodate the supplied text layout, renders the text into it, and returns the image.

toLayer

public ImageLayer toLayer(String text)
Creates an image with the supplied text laid out and rendered into it per this config, and returns an image layer containing the image.

toLayer

public ImageLayer toLayer(TextLayout layout)
Creates an image with the supplied text layout rendered into it per this config, and returns an image layer containing the image.
